subdisciplines.name: Data Visualization
subdisciplines.description: The presentation of data in a pictorial or graphical format, making it easier to understand and analyze.

subdisciplines.name: Data Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The process of inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of discovering useful information and supporting decision-making.

subdisciplines.name: Data Ethics
subdisciplines.description: The study of ethical issues related to the collection, analysis, and dissemination of data.

subdisciplines.name: Data Visualization
subdisciplines.description: The creation and study of visual representations of data to aid in understanding patterns and trends.

subdisciplines.name: Data Analysis
subdisciplines.description: The process of inspecting, cleaning, transforming, and modeling data with the goal of discovering useful information, drawing conclusions, and supporting decision-making.
